name: Joseiaka
description:
Joseiaka is a combination of the Japanese words 'josei' (eng: women/female) and 'aka' (eng: red). The thing to be conveyed from this work revolves around the area of appreciation for the figure of women who in their lives are filled with various stigmas, stereotypes, paradigms, and problems, which are not realized but are felt until now.

f/f digital drawing, 12 fps, 2021
